system.description: At 7th level, your undead transformation progresses. If you’ve chosen @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.Ag1d3VyeU3B3TvBE]{Path of the Revenant} at 3rd level, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-feats.Item.f184qs4inylvs4a3]{Revenant} feat. If you’ve chosen @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.3Jb49f3nacLzry86]{Path of the Vampire} at level 3, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-feats.Item.hywgc7bqlj8726fv]{Vampire Spawn} feat, and if you’ve chosen @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.orEuSrQOYCY8xHXq]{Path of the Mummy}, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-feats.Item.qed0wqkufvjhz1hi]{Mummified} feat.
